tasks.name: Identify Ping Target
tasks.objective: Determine the specific target for the ping operation relevant to the repository.
actions: Consult with stakeholders to clarify the target for the ping operation.
acceptance: Target for the ping operation is clearly defined.
risks: Incorrect target may lead to misleading results.
mitigations: Engage with users to confirm the target before proceeding.

tasks.name: Define Report Requirements
tasks.objective: Establish the format and details required for the repository report based on the ping results.
actions: Gather requirements from users regarding the report format and necessary details.
Create a specification document for the report.
acceptance: Report format and details are documented and approved.
risks: Insufficient details may not meet user expectations.
mitigations: Iterate on the report requirements with user feedback.

tasks.name: Plan Ping and Report Generation
tasks.objective: Outline the steps for executing the ping operation and generating the report based on the defined target and requirements.
actions: Draft a plan for executing the ping operation.
Draft a plan for generating the report based on the ping results.
acceptance: Plans for ping execution and report generation are documented.

notes: This micro-iteration focuses on clarifying the target for the ping operation and defining the report requirements to ensure accurate execution and documentation.
